word: G4135 - πληροφορέω - plērophoréō - play-rof-or-eh'-o - Most surely believe

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - முழுநிச்சயமாய் நம்பு, முழுநிச்சயத்தை உடையவனாயிரு, நிறைவேற்று
to bear or bring full, to make full

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4134 and G5409; to carry out fully (in evidence), that is, completely assure (or convince), entirely accomplish: - most surely believe, fully know (persuade), make full proof of.
